name: Run Away ! The Lava Cave
description:
Run from the lava as much as you can in survival mode and beat your record time, or escape from the cave through the levels, use the characters' abilities to facilitate your progress, but be careful, lava isn't your only problem.

This is a challenging vertical platform game, where you'll have to jump across platforms without the lava reaching you, until you manage to get out of the cave.
